Text: FW Resume Phillip Platter Enron Power MarketingPST Original Message From Platter mailto Sent Thursday December PM To Subject Resume Phillip Platter Enron Power Marketing Dear Ms Kapustka Last year I believe you had a conversation with my sister Molly Elvig about any opportunities for me at OPPD I got in touch with Dave Dietz it may have been Dave Ried at that time and it was apparent then that there werent opportunities available Since then I have expanded on my experience in the power industry with Enron in Portland Oregon As you may know Enron has filed for bankruptcy which has resulted in very uncertain times for many Enron employees including myself While I am still employed in Enrons trading operations and believe we will be back trading as soon as we find a buyer I have decided to seek other opportunities I believe my experience at Enron especially in power trading and scheduling would provide me with a great foundation for success at OPPD The past months I have been trading next day power in the California market My primary responsibilities included making markets on EnronOnline for off peak and oddlot power My average daily trading volume for these products ranged from to trades per day I also had responsibility for managing the scheduling function which had been my main focus for the prior years Much of my time has been spent analyzing the market fundamentals including plant outages transmission constraints gas prices weather and Hydro flows Over the last years in power marketing I have been involved in scheduling all trading hubs in the WSCC including extensive experience with the California ISO I also worked shifts in the real time group I also am a CPA with experience in budgeting and earnings analysis with Northern Natural Gas Company an Enron subsidiary I am primarily interested in opportunities you may have in energy marketing and trading but would consider other areas in your company I have attached my resume for your review and want to inform you I will be in Nebraska from December th thru January rd I realize the Holidays are a busy time but if you feel it may be beneficial to meet I would gladly arrange to be available I can be reached at homework or cell I have also sent this information to David Ried and Dave Kulisek I look forward to hearing from you soon and I appreciate any assistance or advice you may provide me Sincerely Phillip Platter

FW Resume Phillip Platter Enron Power MarketingPST Original Message From Platter mailto Sent Monday December PM To KAPUSTKA LAURA L Subject RE Resume Phillip Platter Enron Power Marketing Thanks for your reply Ill contact HR when Im in Omaha next week I look forward to hearing from you THanks Original Message From KAPUSTKA LAURA L mailto Sent Monday December AM To Platter Subject RE Resume Phillip Platter Enron Power Marketing Phillip Thanks for the email I spoke with David Reid Division Manager Energy Marketing Trading regarding open trading positions He indicated that he has one opening for a energy marketer shift position that will be posted internally first If he doesnt get any qualified applicants he will look externally I would suggest you contact our Human Resources area and complete an application so a current one will be on file I will watch for the position to be posted and let you know when it is opened to current employees that will give you an idea of the time frame for filling the position Good luck Laura Kapustka Original Message From Platter SMTP Sent Thursday December PM To Subject Resume Phillip Platter Enron Power Marketing Dear Ms Kapustka Last year I believe you had a conversation with my sister Molly Elvig about any opportunities for me at OPPD I got in touch with Dave Dietz it may have been Dave Ried at that time and it was apparent then that to seek other opportunities I believe my experience at Enron especially in power trading and scheduling would provide me with a great foundation for success at OPPD The past months I have been trading next day power in the California market My primary responsibilities included making markets on EnronOnline for off peak and oddlot power My average daily trading volume for these products ranged from to trades per day I also had responsibility for managing the scheduling function which had been my main focus for the prior years Much of my time has been spent analyzing the market fundamentals including plant outages transmission constraints gas prices weather and Hydro flows Over the last years in power marketing I have been involved in scheduling all trading hubs in the WSCC including extensive experience with the California ISO I also worked shifts in the real time group I also am a CPA with experience in budgeting and earnings analysis with Northern Natural Gas Company an Enron subsidiary I am primarily interested in opportunities you may have in energy marketing and trading but would consider other areas in your company I have attached my resume for your review and want to inform you I will be in Nebraska from December th thru January rd I realize the Holidays are a busy time but if you feel it may be beneficial to meet I would gladly arrange to be available I can be reached at homework or cell I have also sent this information to David Ried and Dave Kulisek I look forward to hearing from you soon and I appreciate any assistance or advice you may provide me Sincerely Phillip Platter File PHILPLATTERRESdoc

will be posted internally first If he doesnt get any qualified applicants he will look externally I would suggest you contact our Human Resources area and complete an application so a current one will be on file I will watch for the position to be posted and let you know when it is opened to current employees that will give you an idea of the time frame for filling the position Good luck Laura FW Resume Phillip Platter Enron Power MarketingPST Original Message From RIED DAVID G mailto Sent Monday December PM To Platter Cc KAPUSTKA LAURA L Subject RE Resume Phillip Platter Enron Power Marketing Dear Mr Platter We currently have one opening for an energy marketer who works rotating shifts This position will be posted internally in the next week or two If we do not receive any qualified internal applicants I will forward your resume to the Manager of Energy Marketing for consideration Thank you for your interest in OPPD David Ried PE Division Manager Energy Marketing Trading Omaha Public Power District So th Street MALL EEP Omaha NE Phone Fax Cell Original Message From Platter SMTP Sent Thursday December PM To Subject Resume Phillip Platter Enron Power Marketing Dear Mr Ried Sometime last year I was in contact with Bill Jones and Bob ONeill both longtime employees of OPPD They both suggested I contact both you and Dave Dietz at that time Though you did not have opportunities available then my desire to work at OPPD is still with me As you may know Enron has filed for bankruptcy which has resulted in very uncertain times for many Enron employees including myself While I am still employed in Enrons trading operations and believe we will be back trading as soon as we find a buyer I have decided to seek other opportunities I am an Omaha area native and wish to return home and use the skills I have attained in the Power Industry I believe my experience at Enron especially in power trading and scheduling would provide me with a great foundation for success at OPPD The past months I have been trading next day power in the California market My primary responsibilities included making markets on EnronOnline for off peak and oddlot power My average daily trading volume for these products ranged from to trades per day I also had responsibility for managing the scheduling function which had been my main focus for the prior years Much of my time has been spent analyzing the market fundamentals including plant outages transmission constraints gas prices weather and Hydro flows Over the last years in power marketing I have been involved in scheduling all trading hubs in the WSCC including extensive experience with the California ISO I also worked shifts in the real time group I am primarily interested in opportunities you may have in energy marketing and trading but would consider other areas in your company I have attached my resume for your review and want to inform you I will be in Nebraska from December th thru January rd I realize the Holidays are a busy time but if you feel it may be beneficial to meet I would gladly arrange to be available I can be reached at homework or cell I look forward to hearing from you soon Sincerely Phillip Platter File PHILPLATTERRESdoc
open enrollmentPST It is pm November th and I cant access open enrollment system to change my options I should still have time and cant reach antone
